commit.message: Split candidate into concrete and virtual
Enumerate possibilities instead of using builder
Defer creation of new child nodes until they are selected

nodes.bodyText:
The old code would just advance to the next node if resolving failing. If we get a node with broken IP, the allocation will basically not succeed until manual intervention since it would keep trying the same node? We should catch this and try next node if this fails.
Also, lets drop the stack trace for this, see #14599

commit.message: Try another candidate if ip allocation fails
